page.title: 18BURGHFIELD-JOANNE'S DAY
page.content: Joanne is a pupil at Garland Junior School.Here,she descibes a typical day. "Usually I get up at 7.30,wash,dress, have breakfast,return to my room to open my curtains,and make my bed. "I put my lunch and flask in my bag and walk to school with Mum and my brother Alan.When the bell rings we go to the cloakroom,put on our indoor shoes,and go to assembly,which lasts about 15 minutes.We do Maths until 10.45.Then,during break I talk or play with Samantha,Luci,Claire and Laura. After break we do English till 12.30, when we have dinner. "In the afternoon we do Art and Craft or Country Dancing until 3.15.At home, I watch television,have my dinner,read or play with my friends until 8.30 when I go to bed."
